name: Project CommuniTree
description:
VERY pre-alpha build for upcoming game codenamed Project-CommuniTree developed by the student-team the Taywild.

Controls:
 Movement:

  • AD - Move left and right Space
  •  Jump Jump while in the air to double jump
            - Hold for a higher jump
  • After falling you'll start gliding S (hold) 
  • Cancel gliding Glide inside an air current to get a burst of speed

Dialogue:

  •  E - Begin talking when able
  •  Left click on a text bubble - Select a bubble to choose a line of dialogue, You can also use 1, 2, 3
  • Left click or space - Progress the conversation

Decoration Mode:

Tab - Enter decoration mode while on the ground

 Ctrl - Move camera while in edit mode

 Mouse - Move selector
Left click (hold) - Grab an object and tear it out by moving the mouse across the screen

Known issues: The player slides when standing on a sloped floor.
